contexts.context: ...and fought against the assimilation, against the wrong <mark>“Haskalah”</mark>, which blinds the eyes and confuses the thoughts...
...and mocked. Now, also the so-called <mark>Haskalahs</mark> have to admit that our ultra-orthodox brothers...
...exactly those people, who have come across with <mark>Haskalah</mark> and progress and have hidden until the atheism....
